name: Huarui Danfeng Jianguo Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night for business engagements on March 12, 2013 in Room#632.
reviews.title: Nothing exceptionally good about it...!!

reviews.text: An earlier review calling it a "5-star hotel at 3-Star rate" tempted me to book at this hotel. This statement is half-correct though. It is certainly not a 5-star but yes, its rates are 3 star but considering that Yueyang is a much smaller city, all hotels here are going cheap.
reviews.title: 5 star hotel room at a 3 star rate

description: Location/Transportation Conveniently located on the main avenu-Yueyang Dadao, connecting to Beijing-Zhuhai highway and 107 national way, Holiday Inn Yueyang is only 90 minutes to Changsha airport and minutes away from city center, municipal government offices, railway station and bus terminal. Accommodation: *328 beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites, tastefully furnished in classic-contemporary design. *3 elegant Executive Club Floors are specially designed for executive businessmen.Executive Club Lounge is reserved exclusively for Executive Club Floor guests, where guests can enjoy more privileges and personalized services. *Grand and spacious Presidential Suite. *All guest rooms and suites feature an array of amenities. Dining&Entertainment: *Terrace Cafe- All day dining with eye-catching open kitchen. *Wan Li Yuan Restaurant-Offers ourstanding flavors of Hunanese cuisine and authentic Cantonese cuisine. *Rendezvous-Lobby lounge *Games&Chess Room-Private Games&Chess rooms are available. Facilities&Services: *24-Hour room service/Business Center *Health Center with in-door Swimming Pool,flood-lit out-door Tennis Court, Aerobics, Sauna&Steam Bath *Same Day Laundry and Valet service *Hotel Limousine *Major Credit Cards accepted *Worldwide Reservations *foreign currency Exchange *Ticket Booking *Extensive Parking *Convenience Store *Patisserie
